title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - From code to cloud: Accelerate application development with Amazon ECS (CNS341)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从代码到云端：使用 Amazon ECS 加速应用程序开发 (CNS341)
abstract: This session explores the latest ECS innovations, including ECS Express Mode, accelerating development for both individual developers and platform teams. We will break down how modern applications run on ECS and show how built-in observability, deployments, and security integrations simplify operations. Learn how Express Mode simplifies deployment while preserving control, and hear from a customer who built an internal developer platform on ECS to improve consistency and scale. Discover techniques to optimize workflows, enhance reliability, and remove undifferentiated heavy lifting. Leave with practical strategies to increase development velocity using the newest ECS capabilities.
abstract_cn: 本次会议探讨最新的 ECS 创新功能，包括 ECS Express Mode，可加速个人开发者和平台团队的开发工作。我们将详细介绍现代应用程序如何在 ECS 上运行，并展示内置的可观测性、部署和安全集成如何简化运维操作。了解 Express Mode 如何在保留控制权的同时简化部署，并听取客户分享如何在 ECS 上构建内部开发者平台以提高一致性和扩展能力。探索优化工作流程、增强可靠性和消除无差异化繁重工作的技术。您将获得使用最新 ECS 功能提高开发速度的实用策略。
